name: [M]achine [L]earning
description:
In the far future, society finds itself at the cusp of technological revolution.

But before it can achieve it, that society finds itself under the watchful gaze of intergalactic enforcers known as The Outer Federation.
The Outer Federation is tasked with analyzing budding civilizations and determining their worth.
And so, The Outer Federation places an impossible task unto you:
Raise the GIVER to its full potential to determine the fate of your planet.
If successful, your planet may be extended an invite to The Outer Federation.
..If you fail, your planet will suffer complete annihilation.
Can you keep your planet alive?

Inspired by Tamagotchi and the Princess Maker series, this game functions as a life simulation for raising an Alien known as the GIVER to adulthood.
In this game, you choose a schedule for your GIVER on a monthly basis and watch it execute!
Choose what jobs your GIVER will take and what your GIVER will do with the money.
Don't forget to let your GIVER rest from time to time!
As the game progresses, you will unravel more lore behind the world the story takes place in..
And even a little bit about the special GIVER unit assigned to you.
Can you see all 7 endings?
